contacts.name: Misha
contacts.signature: Keep it up! The new world is just ahead!

201270000.text: I want to buy a big storage chest

201270002.text: Yeah! With the exploding cloud candies that the customer gave me yesterday, my drawers are already stuffed full of souvenirs from various planets...

201270003.text: I split some into smaller portions. I'll bring you some when I see you next time!

201270004.text: They taste a bit like a spicier version of mint, but the aftertaste is surprisingly fresh and sweet! This flavor matches the impression I get from that customer perfectly

201270005.text: He was tall and strong with a ferocious expression and a great ax on his back. He looked a lot like Boss Stone

201270006.text: I spent a lot of time preparing myself mentally before going to help him...

201270007.text: A customer like that gifting you sweets. It's got a nice contrast to it

201270008.text: It does. I was super cautious when I asked if he wanted help taking his luggage up! When I realized he was the silent type, I got even more scared and actually tripped over. When I climbed back to my feet, I realized that the customer had already taken his luggage and taken the lift upstairs...

201270009.text: Thankfully I didn't make any mistakes when I went to clean his room and I even fixed his Dreamscape room clock. When I went back, he was not there, but he had left a pack of exploding cloud candy for me. I breathed huge a sigh of relief... That kind of recognition felt amazing!

201270010.text: Do you think... if I keep working hard like this, I'll receive enough candies from guests to cover me for the rest of my life?

201270011.text: Probably, but your teeth will rot! Kids should take better care of their teeth!

201270012.text: I'm not a kid anymore! I may have had tooth decay before, but I've been careful ever since!

201270013.text: Ah, I have to go and greet guests. Talk to you again soon!

201270016.text: Hehe, hearing you say that makes me feel so proud! It's more that the guests put up with me, though

201270017.text: Thank you for your approval though. I need to go and greet guests. Talk to you again soon!
